img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(1\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9a/Five_Skandhas_%281%29.png)
As you approach for the first time, you'll see a monkey that's looking around by the river. Near where it stands, is a statue's head in the water.
img_below_text:
When the monkey has run off, go to the head and collect the **Skandha of Form**.
## How to Find the Skandha of Feeling

img_summary: The image depicts a character, likely the player, standing near a moss-covered statue's head partially submerged in a shallow, rocky riverbed. This scene aligns with the context of locating the **Skandha of Form**, as the text suggests interacting with the statue's head after a nearby monkey runs off. The image serves to visually guide players to the specific location where they can collect this item in the game.
